text: Should AMP be deprecated and removed? I think it adds noise when posting/updating blog posts. If you agree cast a vote <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Deprecate-AMP-Is-this-outdated-now/idi-p/1080044#M200144>
I agree! I just upvoted the idea. :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks. I am AMPed that you did that. :slightly_smiling_face:
